+== Test framework for plugins
+
+Third party plugins can reuse the Elasticsearch test framework classes.
+The build now publishes a dedicated test framework jar that contains the
+`org.elasticsearch.test` package. Add the following dependency to the
+plugin's `pom.xml` to make those helpers available to your tests:
+
+-----------------------------
+<dependency>
+    <groupId>org.elasticsearch</groupId>
+    <artifactId>elasticsearch</artifactId>
+    <version>${elasticsearch.version}</version>
+    <classifier>test-framework</classifier>
+    <scope>test</scope>
+</dependency>
+-----------------------------
+
